casebody.data:
Corey Turner
v.
Commissioner of Correction Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2016

Corey Turner, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Corey Turner's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 163 Conn. App. 556, 134 A.3d 1253 (2016), is denied.
